description.narrative: This activity (Rural Access Programme 3 - Technical Assistance) is a component of Rural Access Programme 3 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £7,036,386. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Social Protection, Road transport, Agricultural development. , with the following implementing partners: IMC Worldwide. The start date is 05-07-2013 and the end date is 31-10-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Agriculture - Economic Affairs - Agriculture - policy, planning and administration
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - policy, planning and administration
Transport - Economic Affairs - Transport - national road construction
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2015 Quarter 1
